items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content:
System.out.printf("%6s  %15s  %15s  %20s  %12s  %12s  %5s  %5s\n", appoinid, pname, dname, problem,
						appinDate, currentDate, did, pid);

items.line_content: System.out.printf("%5s  %5s  %25s  %12s  %10s\n", ltid, pid, testname, date, rate);

items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content:

						page, pweight, pgender, pcontactno, pcurrentdate, pappoinment, pproblem);

items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content:
System.out.printf("%5s  %20s  %5s  %7s  %5s  %20s  %3s  %15s  %15s  %25s  %25s\n", pid, pname, page,
						pgender, doctorId, doctorname, appoinId, pproblem, appoindate, prescription, note);
